content: Sahadenmaare kireedam dharippikkunnavanum thante padayaallika lle shreshdharaakkunnavanum, maar......Sahadaayikku pishaachinum kaavyaraajaakkanmaarkkum ethiraaya shakthi nalki poraattatthil vijayippichavanumaaya kartthaavinu sthuthi. Thanikku ee samayatthum..........

Kartthaave! Ninte karunayodu nyangall praarththhikkunnu. Ninte daivathvatthinu nyangall arppikkunna sugandhadhoopam, parishuddhanaaya maar....Sahadaayude praarththhanakallaal amgeekari kkappedumaaraakaname. Addehatthinte vadham ninte kartthrthva tthinu preethikaramaaya baliyaayittheernnathupole addeha tthinte asthhikall ninte idavakaykku kottayaayittheeraname. Addehatthinte raktham paapaparihaarapradamaayittheernnathupole addehatthinte smarana ninte janatthinu santoshakaalanga llil samaadhaanapradamaayittheernn, athu vishuddhasabhayil nilanilkkaname. Kartthaave! Svargatthilninnulllla ninte randaamatthe prathyakshathaa divasatthil, ninte vishuddhanmaarodukoode addehatthinulllla oharikku ninre karunayaal nyanga lleyum arharaakkittheerkkaname. Nyangall orumichu ninakkum ninte pithaavinum ninte parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettumaaraakaname. Hosho......
